required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Dual-energy (DE) Contrast-enhanced (CE) Digital Mammography
clinical_study.official_title: Pilot Study of Dual-energy (DE) Contrast-enhanced (CE) Digital Mammography to Detect Breast Cancer in Patients With Increased Breast Density (Breast Imaging-Reporting And Data System (BI-RADS) Category c or d)

brief_summary.textblock: This is a feasibility study to evaluate dual-energy (DE) contrast-enhanced (CE) digital mammography to detect breast cancer in patients with increased breast density (BI-RADS category c or d). Eligible patients will be invited to have full-field digital mammography and dual-energy (DE) contrast-enhanced (CE) digital mammography to compare accuracy of the imaging methods for the detection of breast cancer.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a feasibility study to evaluate dual-energy (DE) contrast-enhanced (CE) digital mammography to detect breast cancer in patients with increased breast density (Breast Imaging-Reporting And Data System category c or d). Eligible patients will be invited to have full-field digital mammography and dual-energy (DE) contrast-enhanced (CE) digital mammography to compare accuracy of the imaging methods for the detection of breast cancer

primary_outcome.description: •The primary endpoint of this study is to determine the accuracy of DE CE mammography when compared to full field digital mammography (FFDM) in patients with increased breast density (Breast Imaging-Reporting And Data System (BI-RADS) category c or d breast density).

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Cancer Detected
primary_outcome.description: •The primary endpoint of this study is to detect the presence of cancer using DE CE mammography when compared to full field digital mammography (FFDM) in patients with increased breast density (BI-RADS category c or d breast density).

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Call Backs With Contrast Mammography
secondary_outcome.description: •The patients identified for additional imaging based on unconfirmed findings.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Contrast enhanced mammography vs standard digital mammogram
arm_group.description: Contrast-enhanced spectral mammography for the detection breast cancer .

intervention.arm_group_label: Contrast enhanced mammography vs standard digital mammogram
Contrast enhanced mammography vs standard digital mammogram

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Signed informed consent
2. At least 19 years old
3. Glomerular filtration rate> 60
4. Heterogeneously or extremely dense breasts (BI-RADS category c or d).
Exclusion Criteria:
1. History of iodinated contrast allergy
2. Pregnant or lactating as determined by routine standard practice
3. Personal history of breast cancer
4. History of prior breast excisional biopsy (Patients with a history of core needle biopsy will not be excluded)
5. History of prior breast reduction mammoplasty surgery
6. History of prior breast augmentation surgery
7. Mental condition rendering the subject unable to understand the nature, scope, and possible consequences of the study.

provided_document.document_type: Study Protocol, Statistical Analysis Plan, and Informed Consent Form

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
